title: Get your Hexakills in while you can!

replies.body: You need to put game modes on rotate each week

And how about having access to all gamemodes in custom games?

(All-For-One Hide'n'Seek here I come!)

Riot please do what Biking Maniac said i would be so fun.
{{summoner:31}} "WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE"
I dont agree with gamemode rotation because then riot will have to kepp doing tones of work and millions of updates so yeah so know {{summoner:6}} away

At least let us host gamemodes in customs
{{summoner:31}} especially
Smite rotates game modes every week would love to see league do it
i agree they should put modes on rotation it would be so much more fun if they did i you guys didn't i would be{{champion:32}} and i would have a crying problem{{item:2050}}
as if hexakill is the bomb
... ded chat...
Probably cause no one likes hexakill....
log to up vote you sir.
I do like the idea of having game modes on rotation for maybe a week every month, mite b kewl
riot please make some new doom bots! it was fun last time but make there be rewards for beating each lvl doom bot and maybe for the last doom bot lvl make them be in U.R.F! {{summoner:31}}

riot please make some new doom bots! it was fun last time but make there be rewards for beating each lvl doom bot and maybe for the last doom bot lvl make them be in U.R.F! {{summoner:31}} 
This
I dont think hexakill is bad. Its something different to try and to use the other maps so its not always summoners rift.
fun game mode, maps a little small players can get OP quick and snowball the game but is frustrating when your on the losing team  lol
How about just put doom bots in the bots game mode and urf on forever. And forget about the rest of the game modes!

they already talked about why they won't do game mode rotations. cant remember where but it was around the time draft pick was taken away i think and its because by rotating game modes they are reducing the amounts of people in other queues increasing the queue times for all queues. Too many game modes just thins all of them out.

riot this is gonna sound crazy and may take years to work on the map for this but can we have a 4 team in one game, game mode idk how the jungle or buffs would work or lanes. but it sounds really fun and challenging cause like ucan never pick off 3 or 4 people and feel perfectly secure and also the issue would be like what happens after one team gets picked off like do they just wait in the defeat screen oh and the time it would take to play that but still just an idea

i scrolled down and saw a good topic though if riot would let us hold game modes like 1 day a week in customs of any game mode however thinking ligically this would be chaotic not to mention the people that actually cant play on that day however that doesnt mean most players should miss out

as fun as it would be to have it on ratate week by week riot needs to make their money and promote profeshinalism and ranked and normal games they cant have 75% players only focused on playing urf everyday rip urf best game mode ever
Please don't take it away......{{champion:32}}
you need to bring it out on summoners rift so boring on twisted treeline
hexakill was back??
get rid it soon is better.
